creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 24046
sample test plan

With this test plan, checkbox Run Tread groups consecutively active, and one thread group with "Stop test" on error, JMeter will not mark finished (right box is always green)

(since JMeter 2.3.3 with new stop / stop new behaviors)

Created attachment 24047
Proposal patch

test case : the sample test plan with and without checkbox "run tg consecutively" active
creator: milamber@apache.org

text:
Thanks for the patch. Sorry for the long delay in applying it:

URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=882701&view=rev
Log:
Bug 47592 - Run Thread groups consecutively with "Stop test" on error, JMeter will not mark to finished
